website_summaries.verdict: Garmin's simple and functional activity band is easy and low-maintenance, which makes it one of the best alternatives to a Fuelband or Fitbit.
pros: The Garmin Vivofit is water-resistant, has a one-year battery life, an always-on screen, and works with wireless heart-rate monitor accessories
cons: No vibration for movement reminders, and battery needs physical replacing after a year
You're forced to use the Garmin app, rather than arguably better third-party health apps

customer_reviews.title: Simple, comfortable, waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fitness band that did not require consulting with a computer to read and was waterproof for a reasonable prince. I have had it for several weeks now and its just what I wanted. I can put it on and never take it off. Its simple to use, comfortable and tells me how many steps I have taken/ miles traveled. Disclaimer-I don't really care how accurate the calorie count is, that is not a feature I use. I also don't use the online tools that much.
customer_reviews.author: A. Starnes

customer_reviews.title: Love my Vivofit
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with the Garmin Vivofit. It does everything I want it too. I had a couple issues when I first got it. Trying to sync with the computer and the app. That has all been worked out and it's great. I sync it with the app like a pro and I don't have any issues with it. A friend even bought me interchangeable bands. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: queenb

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it
customer_reviews.text: ok, first let me tell you, it's bulky. I don't normally wear watches or bracelets so it is a little hard to get used to. However, I like it. It doesn't bother me when I'm in bed. It is good for pedometer and such, It is weird to see my sleep activity, didn't realize I tossed and turned so much. I do like that I no longer have to be attached to my phone to monitor this information. my only issue is the actual bulk of the device itself.
customer_reviews.author: Blinkerfluid

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I did not like these. They never worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia d.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Item!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good item, it took me a long time to get to my locker but I already have it in Colombia.
customer_reviews.author: Jairth Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I had more issues trying to get this darn thing to sync...couldn't get it to work with my phone. It would work using the ant stick for a while but would never sync to my weight loss apps properly. Then it would stop syncing using the ant stick and I would have to uninstall and reinstall the Garmin connect software to get it to work again...eventually that stopped working too. Bought a competitor's more expensive version and already happier with the ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: KBK

customer_reviews.title: wish it worked
customer_reviews.text: couldn't figure out how to pair it to the computer and I am not really that challenged. I, with great regret, returned it. I have a fitbit that I use, the only problem with fitbit is I keep loosing them. However the problem with this gadget is you always have to wear the wrist band and it isn't that great of a fashoin statement.
customer_reviews.author: Dreams in art

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Over and above . I use the food program information and stay connected every day. I'm able to constantly monitor my movement and food intake. I've lost 22 pounds and my goal is to loose 8 more. I love my Garmin
customer_reviews.author: joselyng15

customer_reviews.title: Once it works its great
customer_reviews.text: The items comes with no instructions or mannual and the link to the online instructions are not very helpful. There is no troubleshooting solutions so when the band couldn't be paired with the phone on Christmas morning it was extremely frustrating. I ended up googling some question and answer forums and getting some help but it took 2 days to figure it out... definetely not user friendly. .. I'm not the most technology savvy but I'm not usually hopeless either... now that it's working for my sister (who I bought it for) it seems to be as described and she is generally happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Owens

customer_reviews.title: I feel like this is great for what I use it for
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this is great for what I use it for. The reason for the 4 star instead of 5 is because it has no backlight so can't see any readings unless you have light.
customer_reviews.author: Sharra

customer_reviews.title: The heart rate monitor is not comfortable; however
customer_reviews.text: The Garmin Vivofit is OK but does not appear to be very accurate. When I walk or run, it can be 2000 steps off on a 5 mile walk/run. A couple times, my steps have just reset to zero in the middle of the day. I do appreciate that it is battery powered and no charging is needed. The heart rate monitor is not comfortable; however, it seems accurate.
customer_reviews.author: iBelieve

customer_reviews.title: The Fitness Band is sturdy; however
customer_reviews.text: The Fitness Band is sturdy; however, the end of the band tends to catch on clothing and unlatch. A small retainer circle retainer band, like you see on a watch band, might have prevented this frustration. The Band does not always sync correctly with the Garmin website, and you lose data. I would purchase a similar product on the market rather than this one.
customer_reviews.author: KSZ

customer_reviews.title: she loves the purple color and it works exactly like it should
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom Garmin VivoFit, she loves the purple color and it works exactly like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Heaston

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my Mom and she loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom and she loves it for its ease of use and the function that reminds you to keep moving. I may just get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Calmuziclover

customer_reviews.title: and Garmin has very nice software. The diagrams and features on the phone ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas. She has been wearing it for a little over 2 weeks now, and she loves it. She wears it 24 hours a day, including in the shower. The pedometer makes very accurate counts, and Garmin has very nice software. The diagrams and features on the phone and website are superior than my Polar Loop's. It also synchronizes your activity to your account via Bluetooth only when you manually sync it, which saves on battery.
customer_reviews.author: Gupta

customer_reviews.title: great so far!
customer_reviews.text: II am really happy with the Garmin Vivofit! I read the reviews and was a little concerned about syncing the device to my iPhone, but had no trouble, I have no issues logging into the Garmin connect site either. I also find that the device is accurate counting steps, tracking sleep and heart rates. (One tidbit; don’t put your heart rate monitor on until you are ready to work out, the Garmin automatically starts a new activity once it senses the monitor, so it skews your work out slightly) Overall, I am very satisfied with the Garmin!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Does the recommended program works well
customer_reviews.text: Passed the wife test. She keeps it on all the time and it paired up to the iPhone with only a little bit of configuration. Does the recommended program works well.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for an enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife to help her stay motivated and moving throughout the day (sedentary job), and she loves it. Unfortunately the software / reporting is not as nice as the fitbit, but as she isn't that tecchy it works great for her.

customer_reviews.title: Vivofit
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my wife. It's fashionable and works good. The pedometer feature is especially useful.

customer_reviews.title: could not get it paired with my I_pad 2 talked ...

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these, one for myself, and another for my husband. His is still working great, but mine is hit and miss. Only tracks once in awhile. Spent a lot of money, and now it can't be returned. Live and learn I guess
customer_reviews.author: Kilbys

customer_reviews.title: I have had for a couple, months now and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had for a couple,months now and have had no problems what do ever. Would purchase again over any other brand

customer_reviews.text: I love my Vivofit .... Took a little time to set it up and get it to work as it should...only because I wanted to incorporate My Fitness Pal, with a weight control package (calorie counter, etc.) and that needed to be addressed by Garmin. This has been taken cared of and just love it.

customer_reviews.title: love this thing
customer_reviews.text: So far so good in love with not having to charge it, uses a watch battery, shows steps and calories and miles. In the last two weeks I have logged 200,000 steps. Very good for a beginner like me.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, useful tracker for an active lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my lovely and amazing daughter. She absolutely loves it and the heart rate tracker was an added bonus to track calorie burn activity. Every now and then (very seldom), the tracker will not recognize steps, but that's the case with all trackers. My beautiful daughter loves the purple band. She just pairs it with the other bangles, bracelets, watches, etc that she normally wears. I would highly recommend it as a gift if you have an intelligent and active daughter (like mine) who deserves the very best.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney B. Bell

customer_reviews.title: 24-7  Garmin Vivofit logs it all
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it.. She likes the night time sleep feature that breaks down sleep patterns.

customer_reviews.title: I did not like it---sometimes it needed to be reset-- not so easy ...

customer_reviews.text: I really like this because it reminds me to get up and move when sitting all day at my job. I also like that it gives me challenges. Sometimes the syncing doesn't go as smooth as I would like. But overall it is doing what I purchased it to do. Remind me to move.

customer_reviews.author: Dara Tome

customer_reviews.title: POOR LIFE SPAN
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product on June 23, 2014 and it has stopped working already. Not pleased for the amount that I paid for it and the info. stated that the battery should last 1 yr. I hope when I replace the battery that it will start working again.

customer_reviews.title: ... worked the way it is supposed to I would love it! I have only had it about six ...
customer_reviews.text: If it worked the way it is supposed to I would love it! I have only had it about six weeks and the watch is off, sometimes up to 20 minutes. With that being said, I'm not sure if any of the other information it is giving me is correct.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my vivofit. I never have it off.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter seems pretty happy with it at this point.

customer_reviews.title: It was fine I wish it had a backup light
customer_reviews.text: It was fine I wish it had a backup light! Not as happy with it as I thought I would be!
customer_reviews.author: Karen G. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Can used it because it's not compatible with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cara M.

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May 2016. First thing right out of the box I had to replace the batteries in the heart monitor. I had spare batteries on hand, so no biggie. The tracker itself worked okay for the first couple of months, then started dropping steps/distance traveled. It was off about 1/4 mile per mile traveled. Then after about 3 1/2 months the garmin was off by 1 1/2- 1 3/4 miles. Now, barely 5 months from purchase the battery charge has dropped so low that the device will no longer sync. Sigh...so sad.
customer_reviews.author: Tamartini

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 Loving It!
customer_reviews.text: The heart rate monitor portion looked a bit smaller and had I known it was this huge strap on thing you have to wear I would have opted for the bundle without it. Overall the device works perfectly and despite it "learning" patterns I felt it could have started to ramp up the activity level and forced me to do more to get the red bar back down. I love how it tracks my sleeping pattern and gives me plenty of information when synced with my iPhone 6. I would buy this again if given the choice, just minus the heart rate gadget.
customer_reviews.author: SuJo

customer_reviews.title: I really love my Garmin
customer_reviews.text: I really love my Garmin, especially when compared to my mom and sister-in-law's Fitbits. The screen on theirs is tiny and they have to charge it every day (not to mention they paid almost twice as much to get the name). The only thing I wish it had was a backlight or glowing digits so you could see the display in the dark. Haven't used the separate heart monitor because it seems like a pain to use.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jackson

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this has been a great tracker. I love that I dont have to charge it daily like other bands. uits easy to use and fits my purpose well. I dont need a lot of tech, just how far, how many steps and what is my sleep pattern. great for sleep tracking.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I have been very pleased with my Vivofit pedometer
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with my Vivofit pedometer. It serves the purposes very well for me. I like to be reminded to get up and move and this does offer a subtle reminder that it has been a while since you moved. I do wished it had a feature to light up the screen so I could see it at night because I do not take it off when I got to bed, but other than that I do like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Howes

customer_reviews.title: Damaged VivoFit!
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed my Garmin but I've noticed a dot (with no pixels) spreading on the screen. I'm worried it may spread throughout the screen. I purchased this on June 10th. Is there any type of warranty or repair for this type of damage? This review area won't let me add a picture of the defect but I'm considering that if this device is only meant to last a month or two... Garmin is down for the count for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vitallia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Did not like this product at all
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product at all. It gets the job done but it's ugly and poorly designed. Also, the color rubs of the wrist band immediately. I returned this and got a Fitbit Charge 2 HR and I love it! It's elegant and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Reston Eilers

customer_reviews.title: A great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife to replace fitbits that kept having problems with the recharging. It was perfect. It counted her steps without her having to worry about running out of charge. It reminds her if she sits too long, and is overall a perfect replacement for her fitbit.
customer_reviews.author: fuel2u

customer_reviews.title: A great fitness band for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was swayed by a previous reviewer to this product over the fitbit. I am very glad I chose the Vivofit. The battery issue is what convinced me to buy this one. My friend bought a fitbit and has to recharge it at inconvenient times. I love the fact that the Garmin uses watch batteries.
customer_reviews.author: catrickr

customer_reviews.title: The support system is great for this too
customer_reviews.text: decided to get healthy & started tracking my steps. The support system is great for this too. I love the tips they give you, the recipes are delish. & the competetion is very motivating.
customer_reviews.author: richkast

customer_reviews.title: This suits my needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This suits my needs perfectly! My coworker purchased a Fitbit for the same price from an electronic store and it didn't have everything that's on the vivofit. It pairs with my fitness pal and I am really able to monitor my health and fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I love my vivofit - I have had several Fitbits and liked them a lot too but I had charging problems with them. No problem with Vivofit since the battery life is one year. Syncs well with my heart monitor, Garmin Connect and MyFitnessPal. Would like the user interface to be as sharp as Fitbit but it does give me everything I need. Would like the screen to be backlit, so I will likely upgrade to the vivofit2. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Jill Pellechia

customer_reviews.title: great idea, needs some work
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, except the Garmin Connect needs a few tweaks. It would help if it worked a little more reliably. The band, itself, is fantastic, until you try to get your ANT heart rate monitor to work consistently. Love the goal, love the Vivofit, but not it's unwillingness to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Fonda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Love this fitness band. There are still some things I don't understand about it, but have been using for almost a month and I find myself working to exceed my goal every day. I wear it 24/7 and there are no issues so far. I sync it with my computer every few days to gather up the latest data.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with fresh batteries
customer_reviews.text: All though it says the batteries will last a year, it does not say it comes with fresh batteries. After less than a week of use, it is telling me that the batteries need to be changed?? Otherwise it would work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: JadeiteJac

customer_reviews.title: Love this for the steps sleep tracking and chest rate ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this for the steps sleep tracking and chest rate monitor. However what I don't like is that if doesn't allow you to seperately track an specific activity like on the polar HR watches at the push of a button. And sadly the app for this is severely lacking
customer_reviews.author: SaleenMomma05

customer_reviews.title: great so far
customer_reviews.text: great so far. its easy to use. easy to set up. the website is great. it fits like a charm. easy to read. love that it is waterproof!! it never comes off so i don't have to worry about losing it. the fastener is very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, don't use all the features.
customer_reviews.text: The Vivofit works well on the monitoring of distance walked or jogged. We don't use it for sleep monitoring. We wasted our money on the heart rate monitor, first of all, we could not get it to work and don't see it as a necessary part of senior age physical activities.
customer_reviews.author: granddadjim

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this product. However, I would suggest to anyone, buy the one without the heart monitor, you have to strap on this other device around your chest in order for it to work. When I am on my treadmill, it already monitors my heart so it really (for me) wasn't necessary.
customer_reviews.author: sharono210

customer_reviews.title: so can't use computer but works good.
customer_reviews.text: Problem is it won't sync with Windows 10 still on previous windows version which all of us have updated... so can't use computer but works good.
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Never used any other one but researched all the options and ended up with the vivofit. Had it for roughly 5 weeks now and have dropped 10.4 pounds. Motivates me to move and works will with the My Fitness Pal app. Great job Garmin. The only negative would be it doesn't light up in the dark to read time or any other information it stores.
customer_reviews.author: Blinki

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this watch everyday and ordered the different colored bands!! I would highly recommend this watch!!
customer_reviews.author: Melvinsmom

customer_reviews.title: I really wish it had a back light. If ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wish it had a back light. If there is Let me know. It's difficult to read without light. Also, the band falls off during a bike ride or other exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen S. Oleary

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the FitBit and Nike Fuel Band previously and I love the features that the Garmin Vivofit has, compared to those. I especially like that the battery lasts for about a year then you just replace it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nasers

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Garmin Vivofit
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Garmin Vivofit. I tried the Misfit shine, and the fitbit and was disappointed in both. This far the Garmin Vivofit seams the very best.

customer_reviews.text: am loving it I wear the small band on my wrist and the large on on my ankle under slacks if I don't want it to show
customer_reviews.author: Toni D.Miller

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have almost 3 months using it and I love it! It is so useful and I love the available apps. The heart rate monitor works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Karol Picado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I cannot imagine taking it off and on to recharge. One year battery and waterproof is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to my daily routine...
customer_reviews.text: very happy with my purchase...I even talked my coworker into buying one for his wife. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Kays

customer_reviews.title: Love My Garmin
customer_reviews.text: I love my Garmin Viofit. It syncs with my Weight Watchers App. I haven't used the HR monitor yet. They only bad thing is that the band came loose and I lost my first one.
customer_reviews.author: Nana and Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use it, the instructions were not user friendly,
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: is OK, some problems syncing, to look at ...
customer_reviews.text: is OK, some problems syncing, to look at steps you have to go thru all phases and can't go back. I wear it in the pool for water walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very pleased with hers. Helps her out a lot at the gym and at work.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Farrrer

customer_reviews.title: A big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this Garmin product . Counts steps even if I'm watching TV and petting the cat. The clasp is not very secure. It's easy to catch the edge of the clasp on clothing and have it come undone. The Garmin Connect website where you sync your data a very unreliable, it's unresponsive many times during the day. On Nov. 2 it even lost 1.5 hrs of activity data. Have a look at the Garmin Connect website Facebook Page  to see posts about the problems people are having. The heart rate monitor works well.
customer_reviews.author: mataa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wear it every day. One draw back is that it is not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Janna In Marana

product_meta.title: Garmin vívofit Fitness Band - Purple Bundle (Includes Heart Rate Monitor)
product_meta.description:
FITNESS BAND THAT MOVES AT THE PACE OF YOUR LIFE
 * Learns your activity level and assigns a personalized daily goal
 * Displays steps, calories, distance; monitors sleep
 * Pairs with heart rate monitor¹ for fitness activities
 * 1+ year battery life; water-resistant²
 * Save, plan and share progress at Garmin Connect™

You already know the active steps you take now can improve your overall wellness today, tomorrow and well into your future. And while it seems simple to get out of that chair more often and move, making it stick is another matter. That’s where vívofit can turn good intentions into lifelong habits. It’s the only fitness band that greets you with a personalized daily goal, tracks your progress and reminds you when it’s time to move.

PERSONALIZED DAILY GOALS
vívofit learns your current activity level, then assigns an attainable daily goal. As you meet your milestones, vívofit will adjust your goal for the next day, gradually nudging you toward a healthier lifestyle. At Garmin Connect™, our free online fitness community, you can earn virtual badges and view your progress.

TELLS TIME AND "TIME TO MOVE"
Research shows prolonged periods of inactivity such as sitting at a desk decreases your body’s production of fat-burning enzymes. You can reverse that effect by taking frequent, short walk breaks throughout your day. And while you might lose track of time and forget to move, vívofit knows. A red move bar appears on the display after 1 hour of inactivity and builds when you’ve been sitting too long. Just walk for a couple of minutes to reset the move bar.

KEEP MOVING
When you’re ready to take the next steps toward better health, vívofit has additional features to keep you motivated. Use a heart rate monitor¹ with vívofit to record your heart rate and zone data and get more accurate calorie burn information for any fitness activity, such as a run or a cardio class at the gym. At Garmin Connect, you can join online challenges with other vívofit users or start your own competition with friends to compete for virtual badges and bragging rights.

ALWAYS ON
vívofit follows your progress 24/7, and it can stay on for more than a year without a battery change. Set the sleep mode when you go to bed and vívofit will monitor your rest. At Garmin Connect, you can see your total sleep hours as well as periods of movement and restful sleep. The vívofit band is water-resistant², so you can shower or get caught in the rain, worry-free.

GET CONNECTED
With the touch of one button, you can wirelessly sync vívofit with Garmin Connect to see a complete picture of your progress, join online challenges and earn virtual badges for extra motivation. You can access our free online community from your computer or on your compatible mobile device³ with the Garmin Connect™ Mobile app.

IN THE BOX

 * vívofit with large and small band
 * Heart rate monitor
 * USB ANT Stick
 * Quick Start Manual

¹Included with some models, sold separately on others.

²Water-resistant (50 meters).

³Includes Bluetooth® Smart Ready phones; contact your provider to verify if your phone is compatible. The Bluetooth® word mark and logos are registered trademarks owned by Bluetooth SIG, Inc.
feature_bullets: Pairs with heart rate monitor chest strap for fitness activities (chest strap included in bundle package).

Move Bar - Motivates you to be active throughout the day by displaying a red move bar after one hour of inactivity. Additional segments light up for every 15 minutes of inactivity. Just walk for a couple of minutes to reset.
Long battery life - Stays on for more than a year without having to change the battery. Easy-to-read display - View the time of day and your stats right on your wrist.
Achieve your goals - Vivofit learns your activity level and assigns a personalized goal each morning. Count calories - Records calories burned throughout the day including base metabolic rate.
Monitor your sleep - Set the sleep mode when you go to bed to track the quality of your rest.
